fields.headline: Classical CD of the week
fields.bodyText: Debussy Images (1st & 2nd series), études Pierre-Laurent Aimard (piano) (Teldec 8573 83940-2) One of the most accomplished pianists on the current scene, Pierre-Laurent Aimard maintains his admirable refusal to be pigeonholed by adding some delicate Debussy to the remarkable work with Messiaen, Ligeti and Boulez which made his name, followed by the Beethoven cycle that broadened his range and reputation. Now savour his lightness of touch and the wondrous palette he brings to the first and second books of Debussy's Images, alongside the delicacy and decorum due the dozen études. A master at work.
